title: Solve For Equation
text: What is the value of u for $$3u+7=5u+1$$?

title: Solve For Equation
text: To solve $$3u+7=5u+1$$, we need to isolate the u on one side by itself. We can subtract 3u both side to remove 3u from the left handside which gives $$7=2u+1$$. Then we can subtract $$1$$ both sides to get 2u isolated on the right side. It gives $$6=2u$$. We can divide both sides by $$2$$ and get $$u=3$$.
